author: Techlore
description:
Remember my Purism Librem 5 saga where I ordered a Linux phone in 2019, never got it, requested a refund, and was told they weren't processing refunds? Well, I have a major update: after many years and a very confusing bank situation, I actually got my $600 back. Credit where it's due, Purism did refund me, though the communication was rough, and I'll explain what happened. Shoutout to the person after seeing my last video who offered their device to me!

Techlore empowers individuals with practical digital privacy knowledge, security tools, and advocacy resources to protect your data and reclaim your digital identity.

title: Purism Refund Update: I Finally Got My Money Back
